Trade/Device Name(s): cobas c 501 Tina-quant Hemoglobin A1cDx Gen.3 assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Roche/Hitachi cobas c 501 clinical chemistry analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche cobas c 501 Tina-quant HbA1cDx Gen.3 assay for quantitative determination of HbA1c as an aid in diabetes diagnosis and risk assessment.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as an aid in diagnosis of diabetes and in identifying patients at risk for developing diabetes, for quantitative determination of hemoglobin A1c in whole blood using the Roche/Hitachi cobas c 501 analyzer.
